name: Zim's Word Game
description:
Letters

Are

Falling


MAKE WORDS FAST!

Welcome to Zim's Word Game!



In this fast-paced word game, race against falling tiles while trying to score the most points possible. Watch out for fire, metal, and ice tiles! Use the special clearing tiles to annihilate a row or column. Quickly make use of the bonus point tiles before they disappear. Get into a state of word crafting zen with Zim's Word Game.


Will you go for a high score by building longer words? Perhaps you're looking to reach a new level by keeping the board as clear as possible. Figure out your play style and flex your vocabulary muscles in this fast paced word game.
